# dataRepresentation()

**Instance Method**

Returns a representation of the rendered content as data.

## Declaration

```swift
func dataRepresentation() -> Data
```

## Return Value

A new [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSData] object that contains the entire contents of the drawing.

## Getting the drawing data

- **strokes**: An array of strokes used to represent the drawing.
- **PKAppleDrawingTypeIdentifier**: The uniform type identifier for data associated with a drawing object.
